title: Projects

title: Welcome
text:
We generate decision-ready real-world evidence in pharmacoepidemiology and medication safety.


Highlights

Antihypertensive deprescribing & fall risk in older adults
Medical cannabis safety & cardiovascular outcomes
Prescribing cascades and polypharmacy

Start here: Read our Lab Manual for how we work, or see our Projects.
